'''''The Nameless City's Past''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock all the [[Mysterious Stone Slate]]s by completing the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[The Murals of Gurabad]]''.
